mapper.insert: insert into user (id, identity_code, password, email, name, user_name, phone, political_status, head_img, college, major, validata_code, outDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validataCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user set identity_code = #{identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, political_status = #{politicalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validata_code = #{validataCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, outDate = #{outdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, identity_code, password, email, name, user_name, phone, political_status, head_img, college, major, validata_code, outDate from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, identity_code, password, email, name, user_name, phone, political_status, head_img, college, major, validata_code, outDate from user
